org.freehep.xml.util
Class XMLWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.freehep.xml.util.XMLWriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
AidaStyleXMLWriter, XHTMLWriter, XMLYappiWriter
public class XMLWriter
extends Object

A class that makes it easy to write XML documents.
